Articles.Content:
Ok, if you ever see how I build stuff in the VAB, you'd think that I have an exact plan of how to do stuff. In reality:

![fa5.jpg](http://i3.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/newsfeed/000/234/739/fa5.jpg)

Who else feels like this?
Sometimes... But only on occasion when I'm bored.

Honestly, I never feel like that. I always plan everything out before I start building, so I know exactly what I'm \*trying\* to do.

 The problem is a fair amount of the time I can't figure out what I'm doing *wrong*. 

Best,

-Slashy
If we knew what we were doing, it wouldn't be research! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
What is the purpose of this thread?

> 
> What is the purpose of this thread?

He clearly didn't know what he was doing when he made the thread.

***Oh snap.***

For myself, most times I don't feel like calculating everything or at least the delta-V(s).

So I just, you know, "wing it"...
I also wing it, Dont waste your time with math. its only rocket science.

> 
> If we knew what we were doing, it wouldn't be research! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

With your blessing, this will go to my sig ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-03-18T08:39:26Z" title="03/18/2015 08:39  AM" data-short="9 yr">March 18, 2015</time> by viktor19**
  
i'm a grammar ....

oh it STARTS with a plan alright.

And then it turns out that the plan is missing key components. Or that it simply can't be done. Or after a second look I decide it looks stupid.

And tehn the madness begins...
I build a normal design. Then figure it's not cool enough, then spend hours building fairings, rover, tugs.....

> 
> What is the purpose of this thread?

My purpose is more just a fun way of venting my frustrations with my computer system without need of mentioning it. But mostly, I just wanted to make a thread based around that picture (what is says in the picture, that is)
Really not been able to understand the thread.

> 
> With your blessing, this will go to my sig ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Go for it, it's a very old phrase, not mine.

Surprisingly, I feel a little less like this every time I play.

It's true, practice makes perfect.

I was happy to see the dog-scientist wearing safety goggles, but he/she also needs to pull that tongue in when mixing chemicals! ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

> 
> I was happy to see the dog-scientist wearing safety goggles, but he/she also needs to pull that tongue in when mixing chemicals! ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

did you notice another safety issue? see what dog was pouring into

> 
> did you notice another safety issue? see what dog was pouring into

.....Uh-oh. That *can't* be good.
